timeline.title: High School Graduation
timeline.description: Completed high school with a focus on science and mathematics, graduating with honors.

timeline.title: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science
timeline.description: Graduated with a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science. Engaged in various programming projects and internships.

timeline.title: Software Development Intern
timeline.description: Worked as a summer intern at Tech Solutions Inc. Assisted in developing web applications and gained hands-on experience in full-stack development.

timeline.title: Junior Software Engineer
timeline.description: Joined Innovatech as a Junior Software Engineer. Contributed to backend development and collaborated with cross-functional teams.

timeline.title: Software Engineer
timeline.description: Promoted to Software Engineer. Took on more responsibilities in project management and led a team of junior developers.

timeline.title: Certified Kubernetes Administrator
timeline.description: Obtained Kubernetes certification to enhance skills in container orchestration and cloud-native technologies.

timeline.title: Senior Software Engineer
timeline.description: Currently working as a Senior Software Engineer at Tech Innovations Corp. Leading several high-impact projects and mentoring new team members.
